channel.title: Comments on: The WoW Patch 2.3 Leveling Changes

item.title: By: Josh
item.dc:creator: Josh
item.description:
I'm sure the people who say new people have no skill
Or more noobs to kill, are really bad themselves lol, or they need to see sunlight lol fucking addicts...
item.content:encoded:

item.title: By: Holyboss
item.dc:creator: Holyboss
item.description:
To Grimmjow,
After winterspring you're suppose to go to Silithus and also Eastern Plaguelands. Also run through Stratholme and Scholomance for several quests at both of them.
item.content:encoded:
To Grimmjow,

After winterspring you’re suppose to go to Silithus and also Eastern Plaguelands. Also run through Stratholme and Scholomance for several quests at both of them.

item.title: By: Grimmjow
item.dc:creator: Grimmjow
item.description: Just grinded the WHOLE of 59-60 last night and to say i think they need more quests in the 55-60 zone. I kinda ran out of quests in winterspring lol.
item.content:encoded:
Just grinded the WHOLE of 59-60 last night and to say i think they need more quests in the 55-60 zone.
I kinda ran out of quests in winterspring lol.

item.title: By: pally4hire
item.dc:creator: pally4hire
item.description: Wow this woulda been great but I'm 60 already so meh. But more blues = more money!
item.content:encoded: Wow this woulda been great but I’m 60 already so meh. But more blues = more money!

item.title: By: Sakuranyu
item.dc:creator: Sakuranyu
item.description:
(Quote: HolyBoss - "I wonder what the rep will be?")
Seeings that they are gonna be SWC quests its most likely gonna be Reputation for Mudsprocket.
item.content:encoded:
(Quote: HolyBoss – “I wonder what the rep will be?”)

Seeings that they are gonna be SWC quests its most likely gonna be Reputation for Mudsprocket.

item.title: By: HolyBoss
item.dc:creator: HolyBoss
item.description: Level 30-32 is really sparse on quests, but from 33-40 you have Stranglethorn, Arathi, Southshore, Desolace. It's nice that we will get 60 new quests all in one place, when my alt hits 30, I'm heading over to Dustwallow. I wonder what the rep will be? Darnassus, might be a great way to get exalted for the Cat Mount.
item.content:encoded: Level 30-32 is really sparse on quests, but from 33-40 you have Stranglethorn, Arathi, Southshore, Desolace. It’s nice that we will get 60 new quests all in one place, when my alt hits 30, I’m heading over to Dustwallow. I wonder what the rep will be? Darnassus, might be a great way to get exalted for the Cat Mount.

item.description: i agree with 60 may be alot,but it is good for lvl 20's-30's who dont like to lvl alone because its so boring,ihave been there before..and realy,if your good at your character and build lvl 40's can go to that ice place i cant remember because im 70 so...

item.title: By: Balerion
item.dc:creator: Balerion
item.description: This is good news, but I agree that 60 quests seems a lot. I have a mage in the early 40's and I can say with recent experience that the 40's seems a lot more sparse quest-wise than the 30's. Who knows...
item.content:encoded: This is good news, but I agree that 60 quests seems a lot. I have a mage in the early 40’s and I can say with recent experience that the 40’s seems a lot more sparse quest-wise than the 30’s. Who knows…
